TopicTitle: [1.4.3]ALCOR,"Advanced Landing Capsule for Orbital Rendezvous" by ASET (08/02/2017)

Articles.Content: I can control the external cameras from the pod just fine no matter where on the craft they are, but when I IVA into another pod and go to the monitor there I can still switch to the external camera, BUT I can not move it in the horizontal direction and zoom. For some reason the horizontal movement (buttons) work. Other ones, including next/prev cam do not. I have to click on the "switch to camera" button to change ext cameras.
When you say IVA into another pod you mean another ASET pod or stock pod ? if stock then you might need to pod in JSI thread but my best guess is the if stock then JSI isn't set up like the ASET is.

Yes, I am talking about a stock pod. I guess I need to search the JSI topic and find out how to modify my stock pods to have the button functionalities or there is no such thing ?

EDIT :

When I IVA Jeb everything runs smoothly.

When I IVA Bill I can only see the 2 external cams, which I think is normal, but I can not rotate them. I have no problem when I IVA Jeb. They move around and zoom.

I am using the last version of RPM for 0.90. Is it possible there the problem lies ? RasterPropMonitor-dev19-2015-03-03.zip

Edited April 5, 2015 by Mapoko

hello again!

i'm back after such a long break, and wanna say I found some free time to work on my projects. first of all i want to upgrade ALCOR. update is already ready, still is necessary to test it a little and then relise.

Great news alexustas,welcome back!
Hooray! So nice to see you back! Loving the look of the 1-2 interior!
Sweeet! Welcome back~
Welcome back. If you need any testers, I'd be glad to assist.

So, guys the camera not rotating with the HUD buttons of the stock pods/cabins is not an issue, but the feature is strictly intended for the ALCOR ?

Or there is something wrong I am doing ?

Speaking for the external cam controls. I do not expect to control the ALCOR built in ones.

Thing is I want to pit some cameras in a space plane, but I can not rotate the external cameras I did put on the wings from (any) cockpit.

I did put ALCOR pod in the cargo bay and when I IVA in the pod they rotate just fine, but I do not really see it as practical solution.

So, guys the camera not rotating with the HUD buttons of the stock pods/cabins is not an issue, but the feature is strictly intended for the ALCOR ?

Or there is something wrong I am doing ?

Speaking for the external cam controls. I do not expect to control the ALCOR built in ones.

Thing is I want to pit some cameras in a space plane, but I can not rotate the external cameras I did put on the wings from (any) cockpit.

I did put ALCOR pod in the cargo bay and when I IVA in the pod they rotate just fine, but I do not really see it as practical solution.

I am not certian, but I think that the reason you cannot perform all of the same camera functions in different control pods is because the default RPM screens in those pods do not have all of the same functions as the specially designed screens for the ALCOR pod.

...the camera not rotating with...

i have checked defaulf CFG ("...\JSI\RPMPodPatches\BasicMFD\MFD40x20.cfg") of that cam and can say, that unlike ALCOR, it has no all functions, only zoom-in and zoom-out
